item.description:
It is about time. I have been busy and my computer was down for a month, sorry. I have been asked on many occasions, as to how different approaches work. This month we will explore what has worked for us. I will share some scripts and techniques. I invite each of you to tell us about books, scripts, cds, experiences, and what has been of benefit to you.
We can also talk about what we all would like to have presented in the fall. I have several dozen possible speakers, you can help, by sharing where you would like to see us go.
item.name: The Greater Boston Real Estate Investing Club July Meetup
